WinProcs
Star

WinProcs is a list of known Windows processes and their expected characteristics for you to compare them with what you see during digital forensics.

This was inspired by the GTFOBins project for Windows. Initial data taken from SANS poster - “Find Evil - Know Normal”.

  • Image Path
  • Parent Process
  • Number of Instances
  • User Account
  • Start Time
Process Characteristics
RuntimeBroker.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: svchost.exe
  • Number of Instances: 1+
  • User Account: User's
  • Start Time: Varies
System
  • Image Path: N/A
  • Parent Process: None
  • Number of Instances: 1
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Boot time
csrss.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: None
  • Number of Instances: 2+
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Multiple
explorer.exe
  • Image Path: %SystemRoot%
  • Parent Process: None
  • Number of Instances: 1+
  • User Account: User's
  • Start Time: Interactive logon
lsaiso.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: wininit.exe
  • Number of Instances: 0 - 1
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Around boot
lsass.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: wininit.exe
  • Number of Instances: 1
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Around boot
services.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: wininit.exe
  • Number of Instances: 1
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Around boot
smss.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: System
  • Number of Instances: 1+
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Around boot
svchost.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: services.exe
  • Number of Instances: ~10+
  • User Account: Multiple
  • Start Time: Varies
taskhostw.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: svchost.exe
  • Number of Instances: 1+
  • User Account: Multiple
  • Start Time: Varies
wininit.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: None
  • Number of Instances: 1
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Around boot
winlogon.exe
  • Image Path: System32 dir
  • Parent Process: None
  • Number of Instances: 1+
  • User Account: SYSTEM
  • Start Time: Multiple
No process matches...
